Race.SpecificTitle: Bayou Blue FPD -- 10 Mill Tax -- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
BAYOU BLUE FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10 MILLS TAX ELECTION FOR THE PURPOSE OF ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT TO PROVIDE FIRE PROTECTION AND EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES AND PAYING THE COST OF OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES, INCLUDING FIRE HYDRANTS RENTALS AND SERVICE, SAID TAX TO BE IN LIEU OF THE SIMILAR 10 MILLS TAX AUTHORIZED AT A SPECIAL ELECTION HELD ON MAY 3, 1997.
Race.FullText: Shall the Bayou Blue Fire Protection District of the Parishes of Terrebonne and Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special ten (10) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2003 and ending with the year 2012, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services and paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including fire hydrants rentals and service, said tax to be in lieu of the similar ten (10) mills tax authorized at a special election held on May 3, 1997?
